meanings.definition: The quality or state of being primitive.
meanings.sent1: The primitivenesses of the ancient tools amazed the archaeologists.
meanings.sent2: The tribe's primitivenesses were evident in their simple way of life.
meanings.sent3: The primitivenesses of the old computer system made it seem like a relic from the past.
meanings.sent4: Her primitivenesses in cooking were like a throwback to traditional methods.
meanings.sent5: The primitivenesses of the cave paintings transported us back in time.

meanings.definition: The condition of being in an early stage of development or evolution.
meanings.sent1: The primitivenesses of the technology in the 90s seem outdated now.
meanings.sent2: The primitivenesses of the seedling showed its potential for growth.
meanings.sent3: The primitivenesses of the first draft of the novel made the author chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The primitivenesses of the early civilizations paved the way for progress.
meanings.sent5: The primitivenesses of the young chick were a sign of its future transformation.
